title: TutsPlus - Easier JavaScript With TypeScript
description: JavaScript is more than 15 years old, and yet, the tools we have to make JavaScript-based development still pales in comparison to the tools of other languagesÃ¢â‚¬â€primarily statically-typed languages. What if I told you that you could write a dialect of JavaScript, use new features found in ECMAScript 6, have great IDE support, and run idiomatic JavaScript in the browser (or server)? Sounds good, right? Then give TypeScript a look. Please note: an understanding of the JavaScript language is assumed in this lesson.
